name: Team Fuzzy Tail's StarTower!
description:
Welcome to the StarTower

Introducing the debut project from Team Fuzzy Tail (MeltingComet, MrHatmadder), a simplistic emotional top-down dungeon crawling RPG shooter set on a short number of floors. Shoot down a league of robots as you ascend to a tower of unspeakable fortune...or is there any?

Features

  • Ascend the StarTower! Play a engaging action shoot-em-up with light RPG elements!
  • Be Lethal. Be Powerful. Build an arsenal consisting of 9 weapons and level up to be a fearsome challenger!
  • Rock On! Fight to the tunes of Erick "RichardConaway" S.'s chiptune-themed soundtrack!
  • GameJolt Support! Connect to GameJolt and compete in online leaderboards, plus achievements!
